website_summaries.verdict: A large, inflatable set that is easy to blow up and particularly fun if you take it outdoors.
pros: Comes with 6 jumbo sized (30-inch) inflatable pins, along with 1 inflatable ball
Easy to blow up, and easy to clean
Sturdy, and the pins are weighted a little so they stand up well
cons: Some of these arrive with holes in the pins
The ball is pretty light, so you really have to use some force to get the pins to knock over

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We used these bowling pins on a giant slip-n-slide for human bowling and they worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kids love these things
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping they would be when I ordered the inflatable bowling set. Actually, they were a bit larger than I assumed which I saw as a bonus. Most importantly, kids love these things. You don't even need to set them up, just be sure they're outside or somewhere without delicate items within the swing range of a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton

customer_reviews.title: We had so much fun with this!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last but I figured that going into it, kids are rough on everything. They ended up with holes in them rather quickly. I haven't took the time to fix them yet to see if they survive again but the kids loved them. They had so much fun! I would still buy them again. Definitely recommend blowing them up the day before use. The plastic has to stretch and acclimate then freshen them up before use. Make sure not to over fill them, the seams could bust! They don't need to be completely filled, just need to stand up on their own. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie hart

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: Watch the video reviews. I bought for my youth group. They were bored in minutes. The pins are nearly impossible to knock over, and the ball hardly travels four feet from you, so you need to stand within kicking distance of the pins to even hit them, only fo them to just wobble and stand back up. Glad I didn’t have to spend my own money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: This was absolutely perfect for my event with children
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely perfect for my event with children. They loved it! Although, with how light the ball is my kids had to really throw it to knock the pins down.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie hoover

customer_reviews.title: It worked great and stayed inflated
customer_reviews.text: We used these for office Olympics. It worked great and stayed inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea, Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of this set, but once inflated 2 of the pins deflated within the first day...without being used. This was just while they were sitting in our dining room waiting to be used at a kid's event. Can't say enough about Amazon customer service though! When I called to see about replacing the 2 pins or just replacing the whole set, they offered and processed a full refund for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun
customer_reviews.text: I like the durability and size of this product. It stands up best on a hard surface. I wanted it for the backyard, but the pins fell over in the grass. Overall a really fun toy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor activity
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor activity. The kids really enjoyed playing with this set. Kept them busy for hours. Easy to blow up and let down for cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Bree L Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: This has been so much fun for my 6 and 3 year old boys. The only reason it got 4 stars is because one of them came with a hole in it before we even used it. However, it came with a patch so we were able to fix it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M

customer_reviews.title: Holes in three if them
customer_reviews.text: Would be five stars if the Pins didn't have small holes in them letting the air out. I had to return
customer_reviews.author: A.G

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea but product not stand up as pictured
customer_reviews.text: These do not stand up on their own. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: NIKI VANPOOL

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the quality of the pins. The b-ball is ok, but the pins are very flimsy and the plug for the air keeps on popping out. A couple of the pins keep losing air. I think I’m going to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Nate J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bought for a game at school and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Two different sets but still really fun!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one and a few broke so I ordered another. Unfortunately the new set is a different size than the previous, which is a little annoying. Other than that they are so much fun and my kids love them. I just wish it had received the same product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not for play
customer_reviews.text: It’s really just balloons. The ball doesnt “knock down” the pins. So it’s better for decoration and not an actual play toy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible material
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great and is as pictured, but after further checking into the Prop 65 warning I will be returning this product immediately. Also, my son developed a severe allergic reaction after playing with it for maybe 10 minutes. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dell'Aringa

customer_reviews.title: I've used these twice and they have held up well ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used these twice and they have held up well. I do use an electric pump. I imagine it would take hours to air these up manually.
customer_reviews.author: fullspeed1961

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Have a lot of fun with these. Too bad its way too windy where I live. The wind does the ball’s job. But these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena Ruelas

customer_reviews.title: NOT BAD
customer_reviews.text: They are great once aired up. Airing them up can be a trouble because the air inlet is not consistent. Some of them have regular size and some are super tiny - even the smallest nozzle is a bit too big to the valve.
customer_reviews.author: Pak Yin

customer_reviews.title: No quality control.
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a "Santa" gift. Christmas eve when I blew them up, there was a big spot on the ball that looked like it had melted and the plastic had fussed together. It wouldn't stay aired up. I left it out anyways (I had nothing else) and told my girls Santa didn't realize it was broken and I would get another. The replacement I received...had no ball in it at all!!!! There is zero quality control on this product. Returned and ordered from a different seller.
customer_reviews.author: aheckman1015

customer_reviews.title: Great for human bowling
customer_reviews.text: Works great, we use it for our youth group and play human bowling which kids on flat scooters... it’s fun and hilarious!!
customer_reviews.author: Rolling Hills

customer_reviews.title: Loved these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these. Perfect for our church function for the kids. Durable and easy to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Treshur Sanchez better known as WaWa to my grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this. Unfortunately the ball has a hole and needless to say this is most upsetting for a three year old. I'm hoping to see if a new inflatable bowling ball could be sent to me in my grandsons name (Spencer) it would mean the world to my little dude. Thank you, Treshur Sanchez better known as WaWa to my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Treshur Sanchez_NOT_RETURNED

customer_reviews.title: Fun for All
customer_reviews.text: We used the giant bowling pins for our end of the summer party for my Daycare, we placed the pins at the end of the slip and slide, the kids had a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Pattycake Daycare

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the result after inflating all pieces they are sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's over-sized and fun. I bought it for a joke and it was a big hit in the office.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Used these as a game for my sons birthday party. The kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Youngest (under 2) drags the pins around everywhere and will roll on the ground with them. The older two rarely actually bowl - what they do looks more like shot put - but they love setting up and knocking the pins over. They'll run through them, drive their little cars through them, stage dino attacks, its great. The pins have upheld though the mayhem and they adore the toy. Shipped fast as well
customer_reviews.author: Sara Simerly

customer_reviews.title: It is really good but after an hour of being inflated waiting for ...
customer_reviews.text: It is really good but after an hour of being inflated waiting for the kids to come home. Three of the pins deflated.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used this one time but the ball already has a hole! Can’t use it anymore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute set for the kids to play with. Heavy plastic
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sebolka

product_meta.title: Kids Bowling Set for Kids - Includes One Big Ball and 6 Giant Inflatable Bowling Pins Jumbo Bowling Set Game - Great Party Inflatable Games for Kids
feature_bullets: 🎳 OVERSIZED ENDLESS FUN - The kids bowling set can make the coolest addition to your next birthday party, school celebration, or other indoor and outdoor events! Surprise your kids with this fun lawn bowling game. These party inflatable games for kids will keep them busy as they see who can get the most pins knocked down.

🎳 THE BIG HIT FOR YOUR NEXT GATHERING - Bowling is a great physical activity that promotes hand & eye coordination, balance and friendly competition. Create excitement with this jumbo bowling set and your parties will be remembered by all. Play the by bowling game rules, or make your own - kick, throws, bowl or even slide into the pins to knock them over. This awesome inflatable bowling game will fascinate young and old alike! Get your children active and strengthen your family bonds!

🎳 FUN AND SAFE FOR THE ENTIRE FAMILY - With these jumbo 30" pins and 19" ball, you can’t miss a strike! The inflatable bowling pins jumbo are hard to miss, so everyone's a pro. Great yard bowling toy for all ages to have endless hours of fun, excitement and physical activity and exercise too. Create great memories with family and friends. Kids of all ages love to play with their friends trying to get the most pins knocked down.

🎳 MAKES A GREAT GIFT for a bowler or kick ball star. If you are looking for a creative gift, that adults can also enjoy this giant inflatable bowling set is definitely a winner. This is a must have game for bowling enthusiasts and outdoor fun. The boxed set includes 6 (six) outdoor bowling pins for kids (30” inches), one jumbo inflatable bowling ball (19” in diameter). Perfect lawn bowling games for kids that folks can enjoy from toddlerhood to adulthood.

🎳 FUN BOTH INDOORS AND OUT – Our bowling games for adults are perfect indoor or outdoor set. Easy setup and clean up - just inflate when you are ready to play. The sturdy plastic is safe and durable and provides hours of active fun. If you have any issues or problems we will fully replace the indoor bowling set for kids and adults or refund your money, for your peace of mind.
